paragraph.paragraph: Explicit cluster folders have a context menu accessible by right clicking on the folder. The available items are as follows:

Add
This menu item is another submenu. See the below section on context_menu.xmladd_submenuAdd Submenu

Convert to Cluster
Will cluster_folders.xmlpremotingpromote the selected cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folder to an explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder. For more information on promoting and demoting, see cluster_folders.xmlpremotingPromoting.

Include in/Exclude from Project
Depending on the cluster folder's current include/exclude state this menu item will be available. Selecting it will either include or exclude the selected cluster folder, and all of it's child eiffel_classes.cmlEiffel Class File Items and cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folders from compilation. See ../../item_exclusion.xmlIncluding and Excluding Items for more information.

Delete
Removes the cluster and all of it's subcluster folders and files from the project. For any cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folders that were cluster_folders.xmlpremotingpromoted, their orginal folder will be returned to the project, as it existing on disk.

Rename
Displays an editable box permitting the renaming of the explicit cluster folder. Changing the name in ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer will also change the ../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlcluster_nameCluster Name property for the explicit cluster folder.

Properties
Displays the ../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlProject Items Folder Properties.

Add New Item...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box where you can select the EiffelEnvision ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates to add to your project. For more information on adding new items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Existing Item...
Adds an existing item under the Project Items folder. For more information on adding existing items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_existing_items.xmlAdding Existing Items.

New Folder
Adds a new cluster_folder.xmlCluster Folder under the Project Items folder. A new folder will also be created on disk at the project's location. For more information on adding new folders, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders.

Add New Cluster...
Adds a new explicit_cluster.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder under the Project Items folder. For more information on adding new clusters, see ../../configuration/adding_items/adding_clusters.xmlAdding New Clusters.

Add Windows Form...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Windows Form project item selected. For more information see ../../configuration/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates.
